languages.text: {n}Конечности ксеноса конвульсивно содрогаются при звуках вашего голоса. С суровой гордостью он издает низкий гул. Вы не способны расшифровать его, но можете почувствовать его презрительную ярость и суровую готовность убить вас. Это не равнодушие охотящегося зверя и не ослепляющий гнев безумца. Это — инстинкт воина.{/n}

{n}The xenos's limbs shiver at the sound of your voice. He emits a deep hum full of dour pride. You are unable to decipher it but you can sense his disdainful rage and stern resolve to kill you. This is neither the dispassion of a prowling beast nor the blinding rage of insanity, but the instinct of a warrior.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Конечности ксеноса конвульсивно содрогаются при звуках вашего голоса. С суровой гордостью он издает низкий гул. Вы не способны расшифровать его, но можете почувствовать его презрительную ярость и суровую готовность убить вас. Это не равнодушие охотящегося зверя и не ослепляющий гнев безумца. Это — инстинкт воина.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos's limbs convulse at the sound of your voice. He emits a deep hum full of dour pride. You're unable to decipher it but you can sense his disdainful rage and stern resolve to kill you. This is neither the dispassion of a prowling beast nor the blinding rage of insanity. It's a warrior's instinct.{/n}

This is neither the dispassion of a prowling beast nor the blinding rage of insanity. It's a warrior's instinct.{/n}

{n}The xenos's limbs shiver at the sound of your voice. He emits a deep hum full of dour pride. You are unable to decipher it but you can sense his disdainful rage and stern resolve to kill you. This is neither the dispassion of a prowling beast nor the blinding rage of insanity, but the instinct of a warrior.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le son de votre voix fait frémir les membres du xénos. Il produit un bourdonnement profond, empreint d'une austère fierté. Bien que vous soyez incapable de le déchiffrer, vous sentez sa rage dédaigneuse et sa détermination à vous tuer. Il ne s'agit ni du détachement d'une bête en chasse ni de la colère aveugle engendrée par la folie, mais de l'instinct d'un guerrier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's limbs shiver at the sound of your voice. He emits a deep hum full of dour pride. You are unable to decipher it but you can sense his disdainful rage and stern resolve to kill you. This is neither the dispassion of a prowling beast nor the blinding rage of insanity, but the instinct of a warrior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le son de votre voix fait frémir les membres du xénos. Il produit un bourdonnement profond, empreint d'une austère fierté. Bien que vous soyez incapable de le déchiffrer, vous sentez sa rage dédaigneuse et sa détermination à vous tuer. Il ne s'agit ni du détachement d'une bête en chasse ni de la colère aveugle engendrée par la folie. C'est l'instinct d'un guerrier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las extremidades del xenos se estremecen al oír tu voz. Emite un profundo zumbido lleno de un acre orgullo. Eres incapaz de descifrarlo, pero puedes percibir su rabia desdeñosa y su firme determinación de matarte. No se trata ni del desapego de una bestia al acecho ni de la furia cegadora de la locura, sino del instinto de un guerrero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's limbs shiver at the sound of your voice. He emits a deep hum full of dour pride. You are unable to decipher it but you can sense his disdainful rage and stern resolve to kill you. This is neither the dispassion of a prowling beast nor the blinding rage of insanity, but the instinct of a warrior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las extremidades del xenos se estremecen al oír tu voz. Emite un profundo zumbido lleno de un acre orgullo. Eres incapaz de descifrarlo, pero puedes percibir su rabia desdeñosa y su firme determinación de matarte. No se trata ni del desapego de una bestia al acecho ni de la furia cegadora de la locura. Es el instinto de un guerrero.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到你的声音之后，这只异形的四肢颤抖起来。他发出了低沉的嗡鸣声，声音中充满了深沉的高傲。你不明白这是什么意思，但你听到了他轻蔑的愤怒，以及渴望杀死你的坚定决心。这种声音传达的并不是野兽狡诈的天性，也不是盲目的狂怒，而是战士的本能。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's limbs shiver at the sound of your voice. He emits a deep hum full of dour pride. You are unable to decipher it but you can sense his disdainful rage and stern resolve to kill you. This is neither the dispassion of a prowling beast nor the blinding rage of insanity, but the instinct of a warrior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的声音之后，这只异形的四肢颤抖起来。他发出了低沉的嗡鸣声，声音中充满了深沉的高傲。你不明白这是什么意思，但你听到了他轻蔑的愤怒，以及渴望杀死你的坚定决心。这种声音传达的并不是野兽狡诈的天性，也不是盲目的狂怒，而是战士的本能。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの声に異種族の手足が震える。彼は気高い誇りに満ちた深い残響を発する。それが何であるかを読み解くことはできないが、軽蔑に満ちた怒りと、あなたを殺すという強い決意を感じ取る。これは徘徊する獣の冷静さでも、狂気の盲目的な怒りでもなく、戦士の本能だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's limbs shiver at the sound of your voice. He emits a deep hum full of dour pride. You are unable to decipher it but you can sense his disdainful rage and stern resolve to kill you. This is neither the dispassion of a prowling beast nor the blinding rage of insanity, but the instinct of a warrior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの声に異種族の手足が震える。彼は気高い誇りに満ちた深い残響を発する。それが何であるかを読み解くことはできないが、軽蔑に満ちた怒りと、あなたを殺すという強い決意を感じ取る。これは徘徊する獣の冷静さでも、狂気の盲目的な怒りでもなく、戦士の本能だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Glieder des Xenos zittern ob des Klangs deiner Stimme. Er stößt ein tiefes Summen voll mürrischen Stolzes aus. Du kannst es nicht entziffern, doch du spürst seinen verächtlichen Zorn und seine strenge Entschlossenheit, dich zu töten. Das ist weder die Leidenschaftslosigkeit einer Bestie auf der Pirsch, noch der blinde Zorn des Wahnsinns, sondern der Instinkt eines Kriegers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's limbs shiver at the sound of your voice. He emits a deep hum full of dour pride. You are unable to decipher it but you can sense his disdainful rage and stern resolve to kill you. This is neither the dispassion of a prowling beast nor the blinding rage of insanity, but the instinct of a warrior.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Glieder des Xenos zittern ob des Klangs deiner Stimme. Er stößt ein tiefes Summen voll mürrischen Stolzes aus. Du kannst es nicht entziffern, doch du spürst seinen verächtlichen Zorn und seine strenge Entschlossenheit, dich zu töten. Das ist weder die Leidenschaftslosigkeit einer Bestie auf der Pirsch, noch der blinde Zorn des Wahnsinns. Das ist der Instinkt eines Kriegers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zenonun uzuvları, sesini duyunca titriyor. Sert ve gururla dolu bir uğultu yayıyor. Ne demek istediğini anlayamıyorsun ama mağrur öfkesini ve seni öldürmek için duyduğu katı kararlılığını hissediyorsun. Bu; avlanan bir canavarın sakinliği veya deliliğin getirdiği göz karartan öfke değil, bir savaşçı içgüdüsü.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's limbs shiver at the sound of your voice. He emits a deep hum full of dour pride. You are unable to decipher it but you can sense his disdainful rage and stern resolve to kill you. This is neither the dispassion of a prowling beast nor the blinding rage of insanity, but the instinct of a warrior.{/n}
